casebody.data:
Bertha I. BURCH, as Executrix of the Last Will and Testament of Leighman A. Burch, Deceased, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. ERIE RAILROAD COMPANY, Defendant-Respondent. No. 304. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. April 4, 1932. Ward, Flynn, Spring & Tillou, of Buffalo, N. Y. (Hamilton Ward, of Buffalo, N. Y., of counsel), for appellant. John W. Hollis, of Horaell, N. Y., for respondent.

Before MANTON, L. HAND, and SWAN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
